subject: Soccer
World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: The United States defeated Italy, 1-0, on Saturday in the first leg of their home-and-away series. The winner will advance to the Women’s World Cup.
snippet: The United States defeated Italy, 1-0, on Saturday in the first leg of their home-and-away series. The winner will advance to the Women’s World Cup.
